long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About Retro Bowl

Players may choose different team strategies and formations as well as decide how to coach and develop their players in Retro Bowl. They are also capable of handling team finances, which includes deciding on ticket pricing and settling on player agreements. 

The game offers a number of analytics and indicators to aid players in making educated selections and lets them follow the development of their squad over time. Play Retro Bowl unblocked on Chrome or other modern browsers and enjoy the fun.

If you have any questions about our Retro Bowl game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Retro Bowl game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
